lead_paragraph: BALTIMORE — In their final year as teammates, in 2002, Hideki Matsui and Koji Uehara reached the pinnacle of individual and team success for the Yomiuri Giants. Matsui was the most valuable player of Japan’s Central League, Uehara won the Sawamura Award as the top pitcher and the Giants took the championship.
